topic.title: Patient Condition At Destination Observation - conformance rules

section.p: Whether the patient's condition had changed on arrival at destination

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11429 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.37"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11142)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10694)/@code="77941-3" Final patient acuity NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10693)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10695), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet InitialPatientCondition 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.59 DYNAMIC (CONF:10696)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.19
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11142)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10694)/@code="77941-3" Final patient acuity NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10693)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10695), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet InitialPatientCondition 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.59 DYNAMIC (CONF:10696)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.19

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.37" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="77941-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Final patient acuity NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
